TopicTitle: The Unofficial Planetary Resources Design Challenge.

Articles.Content:
As you might be aware, Planetary Resources (http://www.planetaryresources.com/) Plan on building a series of probes with the aim to go into the Asteroid Belt to mine resources, with the aim to get humanity back into space, doing what Science Fiction in the 1950's and 1960's thought that we'd be doing by now.

With that in mind, i'm annoucing an unofficial design challege.

More info about Planetary Resources: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/33389-Planetary-Resources-Bringing-the-stars-to-you

What is required?

This part: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/33713-20-Asteroids-!!!!

What are the categories?

1: Unmanned Orbiter

2: Sample Return Mission

3: Crewed Lander

4: Asteroid Return Mission

Any restrictions?

One entry per category.

Good luck
